description: FFA with specified number of people. One-third of the game are werewolves.
FFA with specified number of people, at least 5. Roles are assigned based on number of players.
FFA with specified number of people. First player is GM.
FFA with specified number of people. One player is assigned to be the zombie to start.
FFA with 4 people. One is assigned to be the runner. No arguments required.
FFA with 2 players. No arguments required
FFA with 2 or 3 players, default is 2.
2 teams each with specified number of people. Traitors are assigned at the beginning of the game.
FFA with 7 people. First player is GM, the other six are players. No arguments required.
FFA with speciied number of people.
Team game with X teams each having Y people. Specify XY as one argument without spaces.
